alert.note: Alert for Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 19 at 10:25PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Oklahoma County through 1100 PM CST... At 1025 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over The Village, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Oklahoma City, Edmond, Warr Acres, The Village, Nichols Hills, Jones, Luther, Arcadia, Forest Park, Lake Aluma, and Downtown Edmond. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 133 and 146. Interstate 44 between mile markers 123 and 151. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
